documentation.text: @notice The TailNumber is the identification of the aircraft, a unique identifier worldwide (in the US also known as N-number)
@notice Price to pay per hour of flight
@notice Total flight hours of this aircraft
@notice All detailed flight activity for this aircraft

@notice Indicates if the aircraft is ready to fly or in maintenance.
 @dev Currently has two status, but should have more (for example AOG, aircraft on ground)

@notice Used in case of needing to stop the contract
 @dev Used to implement the circuit breaker pattern

@notice Adds a co-owner to the aircraft
 @param _coowner Indicate the address of the co-owner to add

@notice Removes a co-owner from the aircraft
 @param _coowner Indicate the address of the co-owner to remove

@notice Updates the price per hour
 @param _newprice Indicates the new price per hour

@notice Gets the balance of the aircraft
 @return Balance available for aircraft

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct AircraftManager.FlightLog storage ref[] storage ref

 @return Complete flight log of this aircraft

@notice Toggle Breaker to set or stop emergency. Only owner can set it.
 @dev Toggles breaker for circuit breaker pattern
@notice Destroy aircraft and return funds to owner
@notice Allow to add funds if there is not enough

devdoc.author: Felix Halcartegaray
devdoc.details: The contract implements basic transactions, assumes co-owners are also pilots and no flights happen outside the contract

params._amount: Indicates  amount to pay for this service

returns._0: True if the change of state was correctly recorded

params._coowner: Indicate the address of the co-owner to add

params._initialHours: Sets the initial number of hours for the aircraft (current number of hours)
params._pricePerHour: Sets the price per hour to pay for each hour flown by pilots
params._tailNumber: Stores the identification of the aircraft

returns._0: Complete flight log of this aircraft

params._comment: Logs any comments on this flight
params._flighthours: Indicates the number of flight hours to log

returns._0: True if the log was correctly recorded

params._coowner: Indicate the address of the co-owner to remove

params._maxPay: Indicates maximum amount to pay for this service
params._mechanic: Indicates the address of the mechanic that will serve the aircraft

returns._0: True if the change of state was correctly recorded

params._maxPay: Indicates maximum amount to pay for this service

toggleEmergency().details: Toggles breaker for circuit breaker pattern

params._newprice: Indicates the new price per hour

aircraftStatus.details: Currently has two status, but should have more (for example AOG, aircraft on ground)

breaker.details: Used to implement the circuit breaker pattern

devdoc.title: Aircraft Management smart contract for aircraft logs and maintenance

ReceiveFromMechanic(uint256).notice: Receive the aircraft from the mechanic and pay for the service if it is below the allowed maximum

addCoOwner(address).notice: Adds a co-owner to the aircraft

aircraftStatus().notice: Indicates if the aircraft is ready to fly or in maintenance.

breaker().notice: Used in case of needing to stop the contract

deleteAircraft().notice: Destroy aircraft and return funds to owner

flightHours().notice: Total flight hours of this aircraft

getBalance().notice: Gets the balance of the aircraft

log(uint256).notice: All detailed flight activity for this aircraft

logFlightHours(uint256,string).notice: Logs a new flight, using the sender as pilot, date as now. Can only be logged if aircraft is active.

pricePerHour().notice: Price to pay per hour of flight

removeCoOwner(address).notice: Removes a co-owner from the aircraft

sendToMechanic(address,uint256).notice: Send the aircraft to the mechanic

setMaxPayment(uint256).notice: Update maximum payment for the mechanic

tailNumber().notice: The TailNumber is the identification of the aircraft, a unique identifier worldwide (in the US also known as N-number)

toggleEmergency().notice: Toggle Breaker to set or stop emergency. Only owner can set it.

userdoc.notice: This contract allows to manage co-owners, log and pay their flight hours and log maintenance and pay to the mechanic.
